Game Concept 🏀:
Basketball Legends offers a ⚡ fast-paced, arcade-style basketball experience.
Players can take on the roles of legendary 🏀 basketball icons.
The game features exaggerated movements, dramatic dunks, and unique player abilities.

Modes 🎮:
Quick Matches 🕹️
Tournaments 🏆
Two-Player Option for Competitive Play 👥
Game Controls 🎮:
Arrow Keys ➡️⬅️⬆️⬇️:

Move the player around the court.
X Key ❌:

On Defense: Steal the ball.
On Offense: Shoot the ball.
Z Key 🅩:

On Defense: Dash.
On Offense: Perform a spin move.
L Key 🅛:

On Offense: Execute a powerful dunk.
These controls allow players to navigate the court, engage in defensive and offensive actions, and showcase spectacular moves like spins and dunks. Each legendary player comes with their own set of unique abilities and statistics, adding depth to the gameplay and providing players with strategic options.

Enjoy playing Basketball Legends, and may your skills on the virtual basketball court lead to victory! 🏆🎮
